full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 250 of 262 1961 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. And your daughter was how old in 1994, let's say? 3 A. 1994, she would have been 7. 4 Q. And in 2004, she would have been what, 17? 5 A. 17. 6 Q. Or thereabout. So you were comfortable having your teenage daughter spend time with Ghislaine and around Ghislaine; right? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. You never saw Ghislaine do anything or say anything that would lead you to believe she was helping Mr. Epstein or anyone else sexually abuse underage girls, did you? 12 A. No. 13 Q. Because if you had seen something like that, as the father of a daughter, you would have done something, wouldn't you? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. And nothing you saw or heard in the roughly 30 years you worked for Epstein ever gave you even the slightest hint that anything like that was going on; isn't that right? 19 A. That's correct. 20 MR. EVERDELL: One moment, your Honor. 21 THE COURT: Okay. 22 MR. EVERDELL: Nothing further. 23 THE COURT: Ms. Comey. 24 MS. COMEY: Briefly, your Honor. 25 THE COURT: Okay. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019112
